mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, fullname, date_of_birth, gender, point, phone, email, bio, profile_picture, role_name FROM user, roles where user.username = #{username} AND roles.role_id = user.role_id

SELECT user.user_id, username, password, fullname, date_of_birth, gender, point, phone, email, bio, profile_picture, role_name, addresses.description, addresses.longitude, addresses.latitude, street, location_name FROM user, roles, addresses where user.username = #{username} AND roles.role_id = user.role_id AND user.user_id = addresses.user_id AND addresses.is_default = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, fullname, date_of_birth, gender, phone, email, role_id) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{fullname}, #{date_of_birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{role_id});
